p: The SDSM developed by Wilby et al. [ 6, 7, 8] was adopted to generate climate change scenarios in this study. The SDSM screens the predictors closely related to the predictands and builds an empirical statistical relationship between the predictands (climate variables of the observed meteorological stations) and the predictors (ERA-40 reanalysis data) based on multiple linear regression. In summary, the SDSM assumes that the empirical statistical relationship is constant in the case of future changes in climatic conditions.
